data: Ironic destiny had brought outlaw Steve Nolan across the star lanes to icy Pluto and tangled his life again with the man he had sworn to kill.
Pohl, Frederik, 1919-2013; Wylie, Dirk, 1920-1949 [Dubious author]; Doolin, Joseph, 1896-1967 [Illustrator]
